0.text: Innate: Urgot's six legs each conceal a shotgun that covers an arc, together forming a full circle of cover around him. Each shotgun can fire once before incurring a unique  cooldown.
0.html: Innate: Urgot's six legs each conceal a shotgun that covers an arc, together forming a full circle of cover around him. Each shotgun can fire once before incurring a unique  cooldown.
markedPassages: cooldown

1.text: Urgot's next basic attack  on-hit within the arc of a shotgun will cause it to fire in a cone, dealing 40% − 100% (based on level) AD (+ 2% − 6% (based on level) of target's maximum health) physical damage to enemies hit, capped at 100 − 360 (based on level) against  monsters.
1.html: Urgot's next basic attack on-hit within the arc of a shotgun will cause it to fire in a cone, dealing 40% − 100% (based on level) AD (+ 2% − 6% (based on level) of target's maximum health) physical damage to enemies hit, capped at 100 − 360 (based on level) against monsters.

40% − 100% (based on level) AD

0.text: Active: Urgot launches a canister at the target location. Upon landing, it explodes after 0.3 seconds to deal physical damage to enemies hit and  slow them for 1.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Urgot launches a canister at the target location. Upon landing, it explodes after 0.3 seconds to deal physical damage to enemies hit and slow them for 1.25 seconds.
markedPassages: slow

0.text: Passive: Urgot's other abilities mark enemy  champions hit for 5 seconds. Only one enemy can be marked at a time. Additionally, at maximum rank, Purge lasts indefinitely and becomes a toggled ability.
0.html:
Passive: Urgot's other abilities mark enemy champions hit for 5 seconds. Only one enemy can be marked at a time.

Additionally, at maximum rank, Purge lasts indefinitely and becomes a toggled ability.
markedPassages: champions

1.text: Active: Urgot equips his machine gun for 4 seconds, granting  ghosting to minions and non-epic monsters around him and autonomously firing at the nearest enemy at a fixed  3.0 attack speed, prioritizing marked enemy champions and refreshing the mark with every attack. While firing, Urgot is able to move and gains 40%  slow resist, but his base movement speed is reduced by 125.
1.html: Active: Urgot equips his machine gun for 4 seconds, granting ghosting to minions and non-epic monsters around him and autonomously firing at the nearest enemy at a fixed  3.0 attack speed, prioritizing marked enemy champions and refreshing the mark with every attack. While firing, Urgot is able to move and gains 40% slow resist, but his base movement speed is reduced by 125.
markedPassages: ghosting
3.0 attack speed
slow resist

2.text: Attacks with Purge deal modified physical damage, with a minimum threshold of 50 against  monsters and  minions, and apply  on-hit and on-attack damage at 50% effectiveness, but they cannot  critically strike. Urgot cannot perform attacks while unable to declare basic attacks.
2.html: Attacks with Purge deal modified physical damage, with a minimum threshold of 50 against monsters and minions, and apply on-hit and on-attack damage at 50% effectiveness, but they cannot critically strike. Urgot cannot perform attacks while unable to declare basic attacks.
markedPassages: monsters
minions
on-hit
critically strike

3.text: Purge can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.
3.html: Purge can be recast after 0.5 seconds within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards.

0.text: Active: Urgot grants himself a  shield for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Urgot grants himself a shield for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: shield

1.text: After the cast time, Urgot  dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through,  knocking them aside and  stunning them for 1 second.
1.html: After the cast time, Urgot dashes in the target direction, though not through terrain, dealing physical damage to enemies he passes through, knocking them aside and stunning them for 1 second.
markedPassages: dashes
knocking them aside
stunning

2.text: Urgot will stop upon hitting an enemy  champion,  stunning them for 1.5 seconds and, after 0.25 seconds, also  flinging them to the location 100 units behind him, though not through terrain.
2.html: Urgot will stop upon hitting an enemy champion, stunning them for 1.5 seconds and, after 0.25 seconds, also flinging them to the location 100 units behind him, though not through terrain.
markedPassages: champion
stunning
flinging

3.text: Purge can be cast during the dash.
3.html: Purge can be cast during the dash.
markedPassages: Purge
possibleConcerningAbilities: Purge can be cast during the dash.

0.text: Active: Urgot fires a chem-drill in the target direction that impales the first enemy champion hit, dealing physical damage and leashing the target for 4 seconds, during which they are  revealed and  slowed by 0% − 75% (based on target's missing health).
0.html: Active: Urgot fires a chem-drill in the target direction that impales the first enemy champion hit, dealing physical damage and leashing the target for 4 seconds, during which they are revealed and slowed by 0% − 75% (based on target's missing health).
markedPassages: revealed
slowed
0% − 75% (based on target's missing health)

1.text: Fear Beyond Death can be recast if the leashed target is below  25% of their maximum health, and does so automatically if the chem-drill would kill the target, the ability is cast again while the target was above the threshold and is then brought within it, or the target is within the threshold at the end of the duration.
1.html: Fear Beyond Death can be recast if the leashed target is below  25% of their maximum health, and does so automatically if the chem-drill would kill the target, the ability is cast again while the target was above the threshold and is then brought within it, or the target is within the threshold at the end of the duration.
markedPassages: 25% of their maximum health
25% of their maximum health

2.text: Recast - Mercy: Urgot launches chains at the leashed target, then  channels for 1.5 seconds once they latch on. During this time, he reels them toward him,  suppressing them,  revealing them, rendering them  untargetable, and preventing them from taking damage from other sources. If the target is near Urgot when the chains connect, they are pushed up to 1000 units away based on their proximity to him. This channel cannot be  interrupted by  crowd control.
2.html: Recast - Mercy: Urgot launches chains at the leashed target, then channels for 1.5 seconds once they latch on. During this time, he reels them toward him, suppressing them, revealing them, rendering them untargetable, and preventing them from taking damage from other sources. If the target is near Urgot when the chains connect, they are pushed up to 1000 units away based on their proximity to him. This channel cannot be interrupted by crowd control.
markedPassages: channels
suppressing
revealing
untargetable
interrupted
crowd control

3.text: Upon completing the channel, the target is   executed. If the execution is successful, he  fears nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds, during which they are  slowed by 75%.
3.html: Upon completing the channel, the target is executed. If the execution is successful, he fears nearby enemies for 1.5 seconds, during which they are slowed by 75%.
markedPassages: executed
executed
fears
slowed

4.text: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.
4.html: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by cast-inhibiting crowd control.
markedPassages: cast-inhibiting crowd control
possibleConcerningAbilities: Fear Beyond Death's recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Colossus: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 2% of bonus health.
Unique – Cleave: Basic attacks on-hit deal ( 4 / 3) (+ ( 1.5% / 1.125%) maximum health) bonus physical damage to the target and ( 40 / 30) (+ ( 3% / 2.25%) maximum health) physical damage to other enemies in a cone in the direction of the target.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+400 health
+30 armor
+30 magic resistance

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Voidborn Resilience: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units, heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 armor and 5 magic resistance.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – VOIDBORN RESILIENCE: For each second in combat with champions, gain 2 bonus armor and bonus magic resistance for 6 seconds, stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of 16 bonus resistances. At maximum stacks, instantly deal 80 (+ 7% bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions within 700 units,  heal for the same amount for each target damaged, and increase your bonus resistances by 20% until the end of combat.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+400 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – The Claws that Catch: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 50% base AD.
Unique – Lifeline: If you would take damage that would reduce you below 30% of your maximum health, gain a shield equal to 80% of bonus health that decays over 4.5 seconds (60 second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – THE CLAWS THAT CATCH: Gain bonus attack damage equal to 50% base AD.

+5% movement speed

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ABSORB: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming  immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.

Unique – Absorb: Taking magic damage from champions grants a stack of Steadfast for 7 seconds, stacking up to 6 times with the duration refreshing on subsequent magic damage from them and whenever dealing damage to them. Becoming immobilized by an enemy champion grants 2 stacks and also refreshes the duration. Damaging basic attacks and spells per cast instance can only grant 1 stack of Steadfast every 1 second.
Unique – Dissipate: While at 6 stacks of Steadfast, gain 10% bonus movement speed and reduce all incoming magic damage by 25%.

Passive

Unique – Thorns: When struck by a basic attack on-hit, deal 10 (+ 25% bonus armor) magic damage to the attacker and, if they are a champion, inflict them with Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
